DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether policy elective single embryo transfer ( eSET ) plus single embryo cryotransfer effective double embryo transfer term clinical pregnancy rate
DOC.brief_title: eSET Plus Single Embryo Cryotransfer v Double Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: The objective evaluate In Vitro Fertilization/Intracytoplasmic Sperm Inyection ( IVF/ICSI ) result term clinical pregnancy multiple pregnancy rate , compare elective single embryo transfer plus cryotransfer one embryo pregnancy achieve , double embryo transfer . This prospective randomized study , include couple arrive Reproductive Unit Hospital Universitario Virgen de la Nieves . All patient good reproductive prognosis asigned randomly one follow group : Group 1 : elective single embryo transfer . In case pregnancy achieve cryotransfer one embryo carry . Group 2 : elective double embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: woman less tan 38 year woman Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1939 kg/m2 FollicleStimulating Hormone ( FSH ) < 15 mUI/mL cycle third day First IVF/ICSI cycle second positive pregnancy test first one More tan five year infertility Previous uterus surgery Uterus malformation More tan one miscarriage
